jobDescription: Cath Lab Nurse - RNWhite Glove Placement is currently hiring Cath Lab RN Registered Nurses to fill Full time 13-week contract assignment positions. If you are a compassionate and knowledgeable RN Registered Nurse with Cath Lab or Radiology experience, we want to hear from YOU!Full time 13-week contract assignmentAs a Cath Lab Nurse – RN you will prepare patients for catheterization, angioplasty, pacemaker implantation and cardiac procedures. And in addition help ease the patient's fear and answer questions regarding the cardiac procedure.What are the benefits for Cath Lab RNs?Excellent hourly payDaily / weekly payrollDirect deposit – for your convenienceCustomized pay packages for travel nursesHealth coverageReferral bonuses for referring nurse friendsAs a Cath LabRegistered Nurse RN with White Glove you’ll also get to enjoy complimentary perk that gives you access to 20 – 60% off on movies, hotels, shows, concerts, sporting events and more! Exclusively for White Glove employees… ask us more!What are the requirements for Cath Lab RNs?NYS RN Registered Nurse LicenseCurrent or recent experience as a Cath Lab or Radiology RN
